iiv.filter

Class LinearImageFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.filter.LinearImageFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterSampling, Mapping2D, java.awt.image.ImageConsumer, java.awt.image.ImageProducer

    public class LinearImageFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.image.ImageConsumer, java.awt.image.ImageProducer, Mapping2D, FilterSampling
    LinearImageFilter sits between an ImageProducer and ImageConsumer applying a linear transform to an image.
    Since:
    iiV1.0
    See Also:
    ImageProducer, ImageConsumer, Mapping2D, FilterSampling
